Hi,

I'm using a DataGrid (from the WPFTloolkit) binded to a big collection (more then 1000 rows).

My problem is that the insertion row is at the bottom of the DataGrid and if i want to add a new row i have to go at the end of my DataGrid.

 

I would like to know if there is a way that the insertion row could be always displayed even if I'm in the middle of the DataGrid.

I know I can do that with the XCeed DataGrid but I need to use WPFToolKit DataGrid cause of the licence.

 

 

Thomas
